script_collections.script: CREATE TABLE IndexDocument ( Id NUMBER (18, 0) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT PK_IndexDocument PRIMARY KEY, Name VARCHAR2 (200) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT UQ_IDOC UNIQUE, Title VARCHAR2 (200) NOT NULL, TypeTag VARCHAR2 (10) NOT NULL, DateTime DATE NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE IndexWord ( Id NUMBER (18, 0) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT PK_IndexWord PRIMARY KEY, Text VARCHAR2 (200) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT UQ_IndexWord UNIQUE )

CREATE TABLE IndexWordMapping ( Word INT NOT NULL CONSTRAINT FK_IWM_IW REFERENCES IndexWord (Id) ON DELETE CASCADE, Document INT NOT NULL CONSTRAINT FK_IWM_IDOC REFERENCES IndexDocument (Id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FirstCharIndex SMALLINT NOT NULL, WordIndex SMALLINT NOT NULL, Location NUMBER(3,0) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_IndexWordMapping PRIMARY KEY (Word, Document, FirstCharIndex, WordIndex, Location) )
CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER IWM_IW_U_TR AFTER UPDATE OF Id ON IndexWord FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE IndexWordMapping a SET a.Word = :New.Id WHERE a.Word = :Old.Id; END;
CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER IWM_ID_U_TR AFTER UPDATE OF Id ON IndexDocument FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE IndexWordMapping a SET a.Document = :New.Id WHERE a.Document = :Old.Id; END;
UPDATE Version SET Version = 3001 WHERE Component = 'Pages'
